sentences.en: 'Commence,'was Monsieur Defarge's not unreasonable reply,'at the commencement.'
sentences.cn: “ 从开头说起, ” 德伐日的回答不无道理.

sentences.en: Don’t let your boss make unreasonable demands on you.
sentences.cn: 别让你的老板对你提无理的要求。

sentences.en: He became moody and unreasonable , flailing out at Katherine at the slightest excuse.
sentences.cn: 他变得喜怒无常、不可理喻, 为点鸡毛蒜皮的小事就殴打凯瑟琳.

sentences.en: He believed it on unreasonable information.
sentences.cn: 他凭着不可靠的消息就听信了这件事.

sentences.en: His request is unreasonable in that he knows we can't afford it.
sentences.cn: 他的要求是不合理的,因为他知道我们负担不起.

sentences.en: I can't endure his unreasonable action.
sentences.cn: 我不能容忍他的无理行为.

sentences.en: I know that they made the most unreasonable demands on you.
sentences.cn: 我知道他们对你提出了最不合理的要求.

sentences.en: I know they have made the most unreasonable demands on you.
sentences.cn: 我知道他们向你提出了最无理的要求.
我认为他是在无理取闹。

sentences.en: If you are tired of being hassled by unreasonable parents, leave home and pay your own way.
sentences.cn: 如果你厌烦了不通情理的父母的喋喋不休，那就离开家自食其力吧。

sentences.en: It would be unreasonable for you to pay out of your own pockets.
sentences.cn: 要你们自己掏钱就不像话了.

sentences.en: It's unreasonable to expect your child to behave in a caring way if you behave selfishly.
sentences.cn: 如果你自己表现得很自私却期待你的孩子能关心别人，这是很没道理的。
他们反对不合理的规定.

sentences.en: They spend an unreasonable amount of money on clothes.
sentences.cn: 他们花在衣服上的钱太多了.

sentences.en: They're crowding me with their unreasonable demands.
sentences.cn: 他们用无理的要求催逼我.

sentences.en: You make friends with people and then make unreasonable demands so that they reject you.
sentences.cn: 你和别人交朋友，然后向人家提出无理要求，结果被人家拒绝。

words.tran_cn: 未加思量的；不合理的；无理性的；不讲理的

trans.tran_cn: 不合理的，荒唐的，非理智的，不讲理的，（收费等）不当的，过度的
